snippet: After leaving Cuba for Texas in 1957, Rafael Cruz spoke out in support of the Castro-led rebellion, only to reject it two years later after becoming disillusioned with its leftist leanings.
abstract: After leaving Cuba for Texas in 1957, Rafael Cruz spoke out in support of the Castro-led rebellion, only to reject it two years later after becoming disillusioned with its leftist leanings.

headline.main: When Ted Cruz’s Father Campaigned for Fidel Castro
